item.source: Help me change the dance emote name to M Bank please :(

item.title: Help me change the dance emote name to M Bank please :(
item.dc:creator: @iceyfang iceyfang
item.description:
@iceyfang wrote:

i’ve tried lots. the dance emote currently teles me to the mage bank which is what i want. now all i have to do is make the dance emote a blue “M Bank”.

here’s my codes.

case 166://M Bank if(emotes == 0) { teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3962; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
and to make it blue heres my code…which obviously isnt working…

sendFrame126("@blu@M Bank",166);//12th emote slot

okay, so that doesn’t work. but the rest of my emotes look like i want them to and ill show you their codes.

sendFrame126("@blu@Train",181); sendFrame126("@whi@Cape", 178); sendFrame126("@blu@Jad",175); sendFrame126("@whi@Shop",177); sendFrame126("@blu@PK",182); sendFrame126("@whi@Fun", 185);//7th emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@MG", 186);//8th emote slot sendFrame126("@whi@RC", 173);//9th emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@Mine", 179);//10th emote slot sendFrame126("@whi@M W", 187);//11th emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@M Bank",166);//12th emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@M Bank", 13361);//12th emote slot } okay, so any help would be appreciated. and i tried the 13361 because i was just seeing if that would work. thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Help me change the dance emote name to M Bank please :(
